text: @IlhanMN @TwinklingTania Everyone needs aid it’s a fkn pandemic and COVID-19 doesn’t give af what your legal status is it will infect you just the same. The mouth breathers is this thread saying illegals don’t need aid have the same kind of moronic thinking that lead us to the worst outbreak in the world
